Posts.Content: Kita1997 wrote: Hi I am a 14 year old girl and I was having my daily shower this morning and when I was washing my breasts I notices an unusual lump :/ i checked again and again and it was there every time. It feels about the size of a small marble. I am worries extra because for the last week I have had very sore breasts but I just thought it was pms. If anyone can help me be less worried and assure me it is nothing please do! Xx Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Worried about a lump Kita1997 firestorm531
